text: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ ٱلَّذِى يَعْلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا

translation.en.sahih: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed by He who knows [every] secret within the heavens and the earth. Indeed, He is ever Forgiving and Merciful."
translation.id.indonesian: Katakanlah: "Al Quran itu diturunkan oleh (Allah) yang mengetahui rahasia di langit dan di bumi. Sesungguhnya Dia adalah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang".
